summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; authorizing an agreement with Public Utility District No. 1 of Pend Oreille County, Washington, to provide a manner of determining compensation to such District for encroachments on said District's Box Canyon Project resulting from operation of the City's Boundary Hydroelectric Project (FPC License No. 2144) as required by Article 48 of the federal license for said Boundary Project.
